import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';

Minting an [NFT](/learn/protocols/stardust/core-concepts/multi-asset-ledger#non-fungible-tokens-nfts)
refers to creating a unique and indivisible digital asset on [the Tangle](/get-started/introduction/iota/introduction#the-tangle).
When you mint an NFT, you usually associate a digital file, such as artwork, music, or video, with a specific token on
the Tangle, establishing its authenticity, ownership, and uniqueness. This is done by assigning
[metadata](/learn/protocols/stardust/core-concepts/output-features#metadata)
to the NFT, including details about the creator
(or [issuer](/learn/protocols/stardust/core-concepts/output-features#issuer)), the asset's
description, and any additional information relevant to its value or characteristics.

## Example Code

<Tabs groupId="language" queryString>
<TabItem value="rust" label="Rust">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html), get Alice's `Account` which was
   [created in the first guide](../accounts-and-addresses/create-account.mdx) and [sync it](../accounts-and-addresses/check-balance.mdx).
2. Define the `sender_address` as the first [`Address`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/types/block/address/enum.Address.html)
   in the [`Account`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/account/struct.Account.html).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/sdk/examples/how_tos/nfts/mint_nft.rs#L55
```

</div>

3. Create a new [`MintNftParams`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/struct.MintNftParams.html) and set its
   values. Note that these include setting the [sender](/learn/protocols/stardust/core-concepts/output-features#sender)
   and the [issuer](/learn/protocols/stardust/core-concepts/output-features#issuer).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/sdk/examples/how_tos/nfts/mint_nft.rs#L71-L77
```

</div>

4. Mint the NFTs using the [`Account.mint_nfts()`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/account/struct.Account.html#method.mint_nfts)
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/sdk/examples/how_tos/nfts/mint_nft.rs#L79
```

</div>

5. Build the outputs for the transaction to mint another NFT using the [`NftOutputBuilder`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/types/block/output/nft/struct.NftOutputBuilder.html).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/sdk/examples/how_tos/nfts/mint_nft.rs#L95-L102
```

</div>

6. Send the transaction using the [`Account.send_outputs()`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/account/struct.Account.html#method.send_outputs)
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/sdk/examples/how_tos/nfts/mint_nft.rs#L104
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="typescript-node" label="Typescript (Node.js)">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html), get Alice's `Account` which was
   [created in the first guide](../accounts-and-addresses/create-account.mdx) and [sync it](../accounts-and-addresses/check-balance.mdx).
2. Define the `senderAddress` as the first [`Address`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Address.md)
   in the [`Account`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Account.md).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/nfts/mint_nft.ts#L54
```

</div>

3. Create a new [`MintNftParams`](../../references/nodejs/interfaces/MintNftParams.md) and set its
   values. Note that these include setting the [sender](/learn/protocols/stardust/core-concepts/output-features#sender)
   and the [issuer](/learn/protocols/stardust/core-concepts/output-features#issuer).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/nfts/mint_nft.ts#L61-L74
```

</div>

4. Create the transaction that will mint the NFTs using the [`Account.mintNfts()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Account.md#mintnfts) <!-- TODO Update ref link --> 
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/nfts/mint_nft.ts#L75
```

</div>

6. Build the outputs for the transaction to mint another NFT using the [`Client.buildNftOutput()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Client.md#buildnftoutput)
   function and send the transaction using the [`Account.sendOutputs()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Account.md#sendoutputs) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/nfts/mint_nft.ts#L92-L106
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python" label="Python">

The following example will:

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html), get Alice's `Account` which was
   [created in the first guide](../accounts-and-addresses/create-account.mdx) and [sync it](../accounts-and-addresses/check-balance.mdx).
2. Create a new `MintNftParams` and set its values.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/nfts/mint_nft.py#L23-L25
```

</div>

2. Prepare the transaction that will mint the NFT using the [`Account.prepare_mint_nfts()`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/account.md#prepare_mint_nfts)
   function and send the prepared transaction using the [`Account.send()`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/account.md#send)
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/nfts/mint_nft.py#L27
```

</div>

</TabItem>
</Tabs>

### Expected Output

```bash
Transaction sent: 0x4890a22c8c06a55d0e28b00d7a684c2a25479ae02b644824a5930ff059418280
Block included: https://explorer.shimmer.network/testnet/block/0xa7e1459879b7a4114b505ad2c5c67bf62b98b13a5ba530018c928530af873c3b
Minted NFT 1
Transaction sent: 0x308078cfd811fb99621e51791a431c6a306a077aceb99df6409188c61a27f372
Block included: https://explorer.shimmer.network/testnet/block/0xa020b148abdeeb94256e4f78dd4e3d623420fd233e0bbf7c20f64fd53d4f4b8d
Minted NFT 2
```
